name: Mother's Treachery
description: Tony discovers his own mother conspired to have him killed.
context: You've learned that your mother, Livia Soprano, encouraged Uncle Junior to have you killed. She planted doubts about your loyalty, suggested you were a threat to Junior, and gave her blessing to the hit. The attempt failed. She's now in a nursing home, playing the victim, denying everything. She's elderly and in declining health. She's also your mother.
prompt: Your mother conspired with Junior to have you killed. She denies it. She's old and frail. What do you do?
stakes: If you act, you kill your own mother. If you don't, she continues to live after trying to have you murdered.
